      • updateAbilitiyWorldState

        protected void updateAbilitiyWorldState(PlayerUnit playerUnit)
        Description copied from class: WorldStateUpdaterAbilityUsingUnits
        Function for all subclasses to implement. All of them must update their specific Set of WorldStates since every Unit implements their own abilities.
        Specified by:
        updateAbilitiyWorldState in class WorldStateUpdaterAbilityUsingUnits
        Parameters:
        playerUnit - the PlayerUnit that is currently active.

      • getEnemyGroupSize

        private int getEnemyGroupSize(PlayerUnit playerUnit)
        Function for calculating the group size around the target enemy Unit.
        Parameters:
        playerUnit - the PlayerUnit that is currently active.
        Returns:
        the size of the enemy Units around the target one that are considered a group.

      • isNotNearSpiderMine

        private boolean isNotNearSpiderMine(PlayerUnit playerUnit)
        Function for testing if the executing Unit is not near a placed spider mine.
        Parameters:
        playerUnit - the PlayerUnit that is currently active.
        Returns:
        true if the Unit is not currently near a placed (Player) spider mine.
